alert.note: Alert for Christian; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 2:11PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Christian and southeastern Trigg Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 110 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Big Rock, or 11 miles south of Cadiz, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hopkinsville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 74 and 86. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
